title: Fishing Planet: Congo Discovery Pack

longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Congo Discovery Pack
<!--text-->
So, you’ve decided to dive into the wondrous world of African bottom fishing! In order to make sure that you can deal with the Congo river dwellers, we’ve prepared all the necessary gear in Congo Discovery Pack. It features not one, but two powerful rods of different types, complete with reels of excellent quality! The pack also contains special baits for the greedy local predators, and what’s more, the extra durable and steadfast Garry Scott™ Dráco™ boat, equipped with special rod holders. And of course, the pack includes the Advanced License and a 30-day Congo River Pass.

Congo Discovery Pack includes:
* 100000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 30-DAYS PREMIUM
* 25 Marker Buoys
* 35 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

MOTOR BOATS
* Garry Scott™ Dráco™ Boat  - Length: 24,4 ft (745 cm); Width: 7 ft (215 cm); Weight: 2976 Lb (1350 kg); Engine: 300 hp; Echo Sounder: Oem, ElitePro; Rod Holders: 2

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* UL-CHUBER™ Mokonzi™ 12' 10" (390) SE - Length: 12' 10"(3.9 m); Casting Weight: 6 – 9 7/8 Oz (170–280 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 39.7 – 81.6 Lb (18–37 kg); Action: Moderate
* Garry Scott™ EquatorMatch™ 8' 6" SE (260) - Length: 8' 6" (2.6 m); Line Weight: 28.6–83.8 Lb (13–38 kg); Action: Moderate

Reels:
* UL-CHUBER™ Fileur™ 11000 SE - Ratio: 5.2; Recovery: 43.5" (110 cm); Capacity: Mono 73/123 (0.8/123), Braid  44/343 (0.32/343); Max Drag: 79.4 Lb (36 kg); Drag: Front
* Garry Scott™ L'impulsion™ 12000 SE - Ratio: 5.6; Recovery: 47" (120 cm); Capacity: Mono 73/123 (0.8/123), Braid  44/343 (0.32/343); Max Drag: 81.5 Lb (37 kg); Drag: Front

TERMINAL TACKLE
Lines - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m)
* Mono .033" (0.85 mm) -  Test: 83.7 Lb (38 kg)
* Fluoro .033" (0.85 mm) - Test: 79 Lb (36 kg)
* Fluoro .034" (0.87 mm) - Test: 83.8 Lb (38 kg)
* Mono Leader .028 ( 0.7) - Length: 2 yd (2 m); Test: 81.5 Lb (37 kg) (x30)
* Mono Leader .028  (0.7) - Length: 2 yd (2 m); Test: 81.5 Lb (37 kg) (x15)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .033" (0.85) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 79 Lb (36 kg) (x10)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .033" (0.85) - Length: 1.64’ (0.5 m); Test: 79 Lb (36 kg) (x10)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .034" (0.87) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 83.8 Lb (38 kg) (x10)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .034" (0.87) - Length: 1.64’ (0.5 m); Test: 83.8 Lb (38 kg) (x10)
* Hooks: #2/0, #4/0 (x10)
* Cap'n Hooks:  #7/0 (x5) , #8/0 (x5), #10/0 (x5), #12/0 (x6), #14/0 (x6)
* Bobbers: Slider Heavy, Waggler Heavy (x1)
* Sinkers: Sinker 6 Oz. (175 g), Sinker 7 Oz. (200 g), Sinker 8 Oz. (225 g) (x1)
* Simple Bell
* Baits: Large Cutbait (x20), Meat Chunk (x20), Chicken Liver (x20), Huge Cutbait (x20), Large Liver (x20), Canned Meat (x20), Buffalo Kidneys (x20), Small Tilapia (x20), Caddis Larva (x50), African Giant Water Bug (x50), Banana Bread (x100)

EQUIPMENT
* Garry Scott™ FishStronghold M Plus Keepnet  - Max Single Fish Weight: 308 Lb (140 kg); Total Fish Weight: 925 Lb ( 420 kg)

POND PASSES:
Congo River Pass (30 Days)

FISHING LICENSES (30 days):
Advanced Congo License
